title: Denver International Airport To Host Job Fair at Denver DaysTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Denver International Airport To Host Job Fair at Denver Days Published on : Saturday, August 8, 2015
Denver International Airport is hosting a job fair as part of the upcoming Denver Days activities that will include more than 20 airport businesses looking to hire a wide variety of full-time and part-time positions.
The job fair will take place from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m. on Saturday, Aug. 8, at the Green Valley Ranch Recreation Center, located at 4890 Argonne Way in Denver.
Available positions include cooks, bartenders, hiring managers, supervisors, massage therapists, cosmetologists, hotel management positions, cashiers, sales associates, baristas and more. Some companies plan to hire applicants on the spot. Applicants are asked to bring a current copy of their résumé and a government-issued photo ID.
Participating companies include: A Massage, Avila, Concessions International, Delaware North, The City and County of Denver’s Department of Aviation, Happy Cakes, HMSHost, InMotion, McDonald’s, Mission Yogurt, ModMarket, My Goods Market, Provenzano, Skyport, TCBY, Tapas Sky Bar, Tuleh Ruche, The Westin Denver International Airport hotel and conference center, World Wide Money Exchange and XpresSpa.
“Denver International Airport partners with a large number of local and national businesses who collectively employ over 35,000 people,” said airport CEO Kim Day. “This is a great venue at which you can learn more about opportunities at the 5th busiest airport in the country, and how to join our community by working for the airport, one of our shops and restaurants or the upcoming Westin Denver International Airport.”
Source:- Denver International Airport
